title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.30 - Life of certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.30 - Life of certification

State Regulations

When a representative has been certified, the
certification shall remain in effect until such time as it shall be made to
appear to the board that the certified representative does not represent a
majority of the employees within an appropriate unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.30

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
